name: Goalbook
headline: Web application for teachers to plan instruction. SaaS to US K-12â¦
description: At Goalbook, we empower teachers to transform instruction so that ALL students succeed. We partner with over 1000 districts across 46 states, working closely with school and district leaders to scale and sustain improved instructional practice. Founded by former teachers and administrators, Goalbook was part of YC Edtech's inaugural class and the first company funded through New Schools'â Seed Fund, now Reach Capital.

founders.name: Daniel Yoo
founders.description: Daniel Jhin Yoo is the co-founder and CEO of Goalbook. Daniel was a special education teacher and district administrator at Ravenswood City School District in East Palo Alto, CA. Daniel studied Electrical Engineering and Computer Science at  UC Berkeley and received his general and special education teaching credentials from Cal State East Bay.

# Effective Instructional Practice Starts Here
Goalbook is a holistic solution that helps special educators develop higher-quality IEPs and implement them with more effective, specially designed instruction.
[Learn About Goalbook Toolkit](http://goalbookapp.com/<https:/goalbookapp.com/explore-toolkit/>)
[Request a Quote](http://goalbookapp.com/<https:/goalbookapp.com/explore-toolkit/#get-started>)
## Empower Your Team With Research-Based Best Practices
Over 10 years of research from leading institutions including Johns Hopkins University and WestEd shows Goalbook:
  * Improves instructional practice.
  * Increases teacher effectiveness.
  * Boosts student outcomes.


[See The Research](http://goalbookapp.com/<https:/goalbookapp.com/research/>)
## Learn How Districts Like Yours Have Achieved Success
Since 2011, we've partnered with over 1,100 districts across 47 states. The results?
  * Higher quality IEP goals with 2.5x more information.
  * Increased teacher efficacy and student outcomes in all district types, from large urban to small rural.
  * Enhanced collaboration and better workflows for IEP teams.


[Read Success Stories](http://goalbookapp.com/<https:/goalbookapp.com/success/>)
## See What District Leaders Say About Goalbook
![Quotation icon](https://goalbookapp.com/wp-content/themes/goalbook/img/icon-quote.png)
Goalbook's quality and customer service go above and beyond. The sequence of design, support, and instructional strategies flows so smoothly that our team has all the resources they need. The barriers have been removed and our staff are now on track to provide the best possible support available to meet our students' educational outcomes. 
  * ![Corey Golomb](https://goalbookapp.com/wp-content/themes/goalbook/img/corey-golomb.jpg)
  * Corey Golomb _Assistant Superintendent_


We partner with Goalbook to align the professional development for our admins, coaches, and teachers. We're empowering educators with high-level resources they can utilize immediately. 
  * ![Sarah Pearson, Ed. D.](https://goalbookapp.com/wp-content/themes/goalbook/img/sarah-pearson.jpg)
  * Sarah Pearson, Ed. D. _Assistant Superintendent_


Goalbook has been a critical partner in helping us ensure our district prepares every student to be college, career, and life ready. Goalbook's tools and professional development support our instructional aspirations around designing learning experiences for access and agency, while maintaining the high level of cognitive demand that our children deserve. 
  * ![Tommy Chang, Ed.D.](https://goalbookapp.com/wp-content/themes/goalbook/img/tommy-change.jpg)
  * Tommy Chang, Ed.D. _Former Superintendent_


## Making Research Actionable in the Classroom
“Goalbook completely aligns with what my school and I believe about education. You can be a first-year teacher or a veteran teacher and still learn something from accessing Goalbook. It empowers teachers to take control of their learning within their own classrooms.”
  * ![Mika Moore, Department Lead](https://goalbookapp.com/wp-content/themes/goalbook/img/mika-moore.png)
  * Mika Moore, Department Lead _SAN FRANCISCO UNIFIED SCHOOL DISTRICT, CA_


[Watch Video](http://goalbookapp.com/<https:/player.vimeo.com/video/122335785?autoplay=1&muted=0>)
# Ready to Learn How We Can Help Your District?
We partner with leaders in over 1,100 districts to help educators improve instructional practice. Request a quote below to learn more about how we can help your district.
[Request a Quote](http://goalbookapp.com/<https:/goalbookapp.com/explore-toolkit/#get-started>)
## Create Inclusive Learning Experiences for All Students
Our white paper, “Different Paths Up the Same Mountain,” shares our 5-step instructional design process for:
  * Leveraging Universal Design for Learning (UDL).
  * Integrating UDL with your state standards.
  * Implementing differentiated instruction for diverse learners.


[Download Our White Paper](http://goalbookapp.com/<https:/goalbookapp.com/differentpaths/>)
[![Goalbook's wordmark logo linking back to the home page](https://goalbookapp.com/wp-content/themes/goalbook/img/footer-logo.svg)](http://goalbookapp.com/<https:/goalbookapp.com>)

generated_description:
**Goalbook: Empowering Educators, Transforming Learning**

Founded in 2011 and based in San Mateo, California, Goalbook is a robust SaaS platform focused on empowering K-12 educators to enhance instructional practices, particularly for special education. The company started with a vision: to ensure that all students thrive by transforming how teachers plan and deliver instruction. With over a decade of experience, Goalbook now partners with more than 1,100 school districts across 47 states, demonstrating its commitment and reach within the educational sector.

**Mission and Impact**

Goalbook equips teachers with tools designed for effective educational planning, enabling the creation of high-quality Individualized Education Programs (IEPs). Their platform integrates research-backed methodologies to support diverse learners, ensuring that educators can address varying needs in the classroom. Notably, research from reputable institutions like Johns Hopkins University validates that using Goalbook leads to improvements in teacher effectiveness and student outcomes. 

**A Collaborative Approach**

The company, which is part of the esteemed Y Combinator's Batch IK12, collaborates closely with educational leaders to foster sustainable improvements in teaching practices. With a team of around 100, founded by former educators who understand the intricacies of the classroom, Goalbook is dedicated to breaking down barriers hindering educational fulfillment.

**Products and Resources**

Goalbook offers an array of resources, including the Goalbook Toolkit, which provides frameworks and competencies essential for effective teaching. They also showcase success stories that demonstrate tangible impacts from districts implementing their platform. Curious educators can explore further through their [Website](http://goalbookapp.com), where various tools and research studies are available.

**Endorsements and Success**

Testimonials from district leaders highlight the platform's effectiveness—educators report enhanced collaboration, streamlined workflows, and a significant positive impact on instructional quality. Goalbook's commitment to research-driven practices positions it as an invaluable partner for schools aiming for excellence in education.

**Get Started**

If you’re an educator or a district leader interested in elevating instructional quality and inclusivity in your classrooms, explore how Goalbook can assist you through their resources and services. The future of education is here, and it's all about equipping educators to succeed. [Request a quote](http://goalbookapp.com/<https:/goalbookapp.com/explore-toolkit/#get-started>) today and discover the potential of your teaching!

In summary, Goalbook isn't just a tool—it's a transformative partner in the educational journey, dedicated to ensuring that all students have the opportunity to thrive.
